segments.text: I am observing a typical kitchen scene, though something is quite amiss.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is diligently polishing a plate, her focus absolute.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the faucet is fully open, water pouring into the basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To my astonishment, the sink is completely overflowing, a sheet of water cascading down the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A growing puddle is forming right at her feet, yet she seems completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dress is getting soaked, and one foot is submerged in the rising water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not feel that cold water pooling around her?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me a little anxious to see such an imminent disaster go unnoticed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of water damage to the cabinets and floor makes me wince.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She continues her task with such a serene expression, it's almost unbelievable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what thoughts are occupying her mind so completely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This level of unawareness is truly quite remarkable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to shout out a warning to her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water just keeps on flowing, a silent, relentless stream.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This situation is going to get much worse very quickly.
segments.speaker: PAR
